name: Snow (itch) (Cosmic Nomad)
description:
Very buggy, i still have a LOT to fix... made with raylib.

when playing, toggle C for centered camera mode, if on free mode, hold left ctrl to self center.

hide  behind obstacles, and throw the snowballs(in the direction you are facing), hold shift to aim (change directions)and not move.

I hope the collision is perfect, it is on my version of the game, but when i download this one, its weird..
